(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Wagyu))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADVP (RB once)
        (NP (DT a) (NN luxury)))
      (ADJP (RB only) (JJ available)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (DT the)
            (ADJP (RB very) (RB well) (JJ heeled))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(available-7, Wagyu-1)
cop(available-7, was-2)
advmod(available-7, once-3)
det(luxury-5, a-4)
pobj(once-3, luxury-5)
advmod(available-7, only-6)
root(ROOT-0, available-7)
prep(available-7, to-8)
det(heeled-12, the-9)
advmod(heeled-12, very-10)
advmod(heeled-12, well-11)
pobj(to-8, heeled-12)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (ADVP (RB ,))))


root(ROOT-0, Now-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN become)
        (NP
          (NP (NN something))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT that))
            (S
              (ADVP (RB even))
              (VP (VBZ aunties)
                (NP
                  (NP (NN talk) (RB about))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NNP Teochew))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(something-4, it-1)
aux(something-4, has-2)
cop(something-4, become-3)
root(ROOT-0, something-4)
nsubj(aunties-7, that-5)
advmod(aunties-7, even-6)
rcmod(something-4, aunties-7)
dobj(aunties-7, talk-8)
advmod(talk-8, about-9)
prep(talk-8, in-10)
pobj(in-10, Teochew-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (VP (VBN amazed)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB find)
              (S
                (NP (PRP it))
                (VP (VBG being)
                  (VP (VBN sold)
                    (PP (IN at)
                      (NP (NN heartland) (NNS supermarkets)))
                    (PP (IN like)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN NTUC))
                        (PP (IN at)
                          (NP (NNP Bishan)))))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHADVP (WRB where))
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP I))
                        (ADVP (RB sometimes))
                        (VP (VB buy)
                          (NP (PRP$ my) (NN beef)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubjpass(amazed-3, I-1)
auxpass(amazed-3, was-2)
root(ROOT-0, amazed-3)
aux(find-5, to-4)
xcomp(amazed-3, find-5)
nsubjpass(sold-8, it-6)
auxpass(sold-8, being-7)
dep(find-5, sold-8)
prep(sold-8, at-9)
nn(supermarkets-11, heartland-10)
pobj(at-9, supermarkets-11)
prep(sold-8, like-12)
det(NTUC-14, the-13)
pobj(like-12, NTUC-14)
prep(NTUC-14, at-15)
pobj(at-15, Bishan-16)
advmod(buy-20, where-17)
nsubj(buy-20, I-18)
advmod(buy-20, sometimes-19)
advcl(sold-8, buy-20)
poss(beef-22, my-21)
dobj(buy-20, beef-22)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP (NN fact)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, In-1)
pobj(In-1, fact-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT the) (JJ Japanese) (NN style) (NNP Shabu) (NNP Shabu) (NN beef))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (ADVP (RB almost) (RB completely))
      (VP (VBN re-defined)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN way))
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (PRP we))
              (VP (VBP eat)
                (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS steamboats))
                (ADVP (RB nowadays))))))))
    (. .)))


det(beef-6, the-1)
amod(beef-6, Japanese-2)
nn(beef-6, style-3)
nn(beef-6, Shabu-4)
nn(beef-6, Shabu-5)
nsubj(re-defined-10, beef-6)
aux(re-defined-10, has-7)
advmod(completely-9, almost-8)
advmod(re-defined-10, completely-9)
root(ROOT-0, re-defined-10)
det(way-12, the-11)
dobj(re-defined-10, way-12)
nsubj(eat-14, we-13)
rcmod(way-12, eat-14)
poss(steamboats-16, our-15)
dobj(eat-14, steamboats-16)
advmod(eat-14, nowadays-17)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP (DT the) (NN past)))
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VBD used)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB have)
            (NP
              (NP (NNS strips))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NN beef)))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT which))
                (S
                  (NP (PRP we))
                  (VP (VBP place)
                    (PP (IN in)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN net)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB cook)
                              (PP (IN in)
                                (NP (DT the) (NN steamboat))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


prep(used-5, In-1)
det(past-3, the-2)
pobj(In-1, past-3)
nsubj(used-5, we-4)
root(ROOT-0, used-5)
aux(have-7, to-6)
xcomp(used-5, have-7)
dobj(have-7, strips-8)
prep(strips-8, of-9)
pobj(of-9, beef-10)
dobj(place-13, which-11)
nsubj(place-13, we-12)
rcmod(strips-8, place-13)
prep(place-13, in-14)
det(net-16, the-15)
pobj(in-14, net-16)
aux(cook-18, to-17)
infmod(net-16, cook-18)
prep(cook-18, in-19)
det(steamboat-21, the-20)
pobj(in-19, steamboat-21)

  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Nowadays))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN everyone))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBG dipping)
        (NP
          (ADJP (RB thinly) (JJ sliced))
          (NN beef))
        (PP (IN into)
          (NP (DT the) (NN hotpot)))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(dipping-3, everyone-1)
aux(dipping-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, dipping-3)
advmod(sliced-5, thinly-4)
amod(beef-6, sliced-5)
dobj(dipping-3, beef-6)
prep(dipping-3, into-7)
det(hotpot-9, the-8)
pobj(into-7, hotpot-9)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNP Shabu) (NNP Shabu))
    (NP (NN style))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, Shabu-2)
dep(Shabu-2, style-3)
